H0.text: What is the second lightest chemical element. Helium

H1.text: What is the second lightest chemical element. Lithium

H2.text: What is the second lightest chemical element. Beryllium

H3.text: What is the second lightest chemical element. E939

A4.text: It is the second-lightest and second-most abundant element in the observable universe, after hydrogen.
